reviewText: Amazing addition to the book.  Will be a great resource for the men's small group I will be leading.
This is such a great resource! The DVD comes with a PDF study guide. Totally worth it!
It's a great resource to use with your study group. It's extremely thorough, you're getting majority of the content in the book, although I'd still recommend you read the book.

It was very eye opening that I had wrong thinking about finding a spouse.  It was biblical based and very logical and very easy to follow along. It also was good to change us to be the right mate. I recommend this for any Christian young or old that is hoping to be married again.
I read the book - awesome, so I thought the DVD's would help. Gave this four stars only because it did not have the printed study guide that I thought was supposed to come with it. Would be helpful.
I chose to rate this a 5 star because it arrived in great condition and it is an awesome teaching.
